row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:IF &UC4RB_REPORT_TYPE# = "SNAPSHOTOVERVIEW" : SET &UC4RB_REPORT_ID# = 0 :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_REPORT_TYPE# = "SNAPSHOTCOMPARE" : IF &UC4RB_CONTENT_STATUS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_REPORT_STATUS# = &UC4RB_CONTENT_STATUS# : ENDIF :ENDIF
:SET &RUNID# = SYS_ACT_TOP_NR() :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#snapshot-tool.jar" snapshot.communication SnapshotReport &UC4RB_RM_USERNAME# &UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD# ? "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" &UC4RB_REPORT_ID# &RUNID# ? &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_GUID# &UC4RB_REPORT_TYPE# &UC4RB_REPORT_FORMAT# &UC4RB_REPORT_COMPRESSION# ? &UC4RB_REPORT_STATUS# "&UC4RB_XSLT_FILE_NAME#" "&UC4RB_XML_FILE_NAME#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
